import torch

# 创建一个简单的测试来验证GPU是否真正在工作
device = torch.device(''cuda:0'')
x = torch.randn(1000, 1000).to(device)
y = torch.randn(1000, 1000).to(device)

# 执行计算
import time
start = time.time()
for i in range(100):
    z = torch.mm(x, y)
torch.cuda.synchronize()
print(f''GPU计算时间: {time.time() - start:.3f}秒'')

# CPU对比
x_cpu = x.cpu()
y_cpu = y.cpu()
start = time.time()
for i in range(100):
    z_cpu = torch.mm(x_cpu, y_cpu)
print(f''CPU计算时间: {time.time() - start:.3f}秒'')
")
